package.name: syslinux
package.patch: cd syslinux-6.04~git20190206.bf6db5b4 cat ../debian/patches/series | while read fname ; do cat ../debian/patches/$fname | patch -p1; done
package.build: #export CC=/usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54 #export CXX=/usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54 #cd nasm-2.11.05 #./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc #make #NASMPATH=` pwd `/nasm cd syslinux-6.04~git20190206.bf6db5b4 make -k clean make -k -j 6 #NASM=${NASMPATH} make -k -j 6 bios #NASM=${NASMPATH} mv bios/extlinux/extlinux ../extlinux.dynamic mv bios/mtools/syslinux ../syslinux.dynamic make -k bios LDFLAGS=-static #NASM=${NASMPATH}
package.install:
test -f ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/extlinux/extlinux || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/static/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/syslinux
install -m 0755 syslinux.dynamic ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/syslinux install -m 0755 extlinux.dynamic ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/extlinux
install -m 0755 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/extlinux/extlinux ${TGTDIR}/static/sbin/extlinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/core/isolinux.bin ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/core/pxelinux.bin ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/gpxe/pxelinux.gpxe ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux
install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/menu/menu.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/menu/vesamenu.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/modules/ifcpu.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/modules/ifcpu64.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/modules/reboot.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/chain/chain.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/elflink/ldlinux/ldlinux.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/libutil/libutil.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/cmenu/libmenu/libmenu.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/cmenu/libmenu/complex.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/lib/libcom32.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/lib/libbios/com32.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/lua/src/liblua.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/com32/gpllib/libgpl.c32 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux
install -m 0755 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/utils/isohybrid ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin install -m 0755 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/utils/isohybrid.pl ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/mbr/mbr.bin ${TGTDIR}/etc/syslinux install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/mbr/gptmbr.bin ${TGTDIR}/etc/syslinux for f in ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/mbr/*.bin ; do install -m 0644 ${f} ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux/ done
